'''House Payne''' is a vassal house that holds fealty to [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. It is divided into several branches.

House Payne's [[Heraldry|heraldry]] consists of purple and white chequy with gold coins in the checks.
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Payne is noted as a valued vassal of the Lannisters. Ser Ilyn Payne was a loyal and stalwart warrior in the service of Lord [[Tywin Lannister]] and commander of his personal guard. His tongue was torn out with hot pincers at the order of the [[Mad King]] after Ilyn was overheard suggesting that Tywin really ruled the realm (as [[Hand of the King]]) rather than the insane monarch. Tywin wasn't in a position to protest. After the rebellion overthrew the Mad King, [[Robert Baratheon]] made Ilyn King's Justice (head executioner) as a favor to Tywin Lannister.

Podrick Payne is the only other member of the family to appear. He is a very distant cousin of Ser Ilyn's from a different branch of the family. He is a squire to [[Tyrion Lannister]].
sections.Members:
* Ser [[Ilyn Payne]], the [[King's Justice]].
* [[Podrick Payne]], a young [[squire]], a distant cousin of Ser Ilyn's from a lesser branch of the family.
